title: Select Door plate
content:
Hi friend please help me id these fonts used on this plate ...Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203527im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/selectdoor_6356.jpg)

 [‹ Odometer font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203527/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35403 "Go to previous forum topic") [Fiesta Grocery logo - can you identify this font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203527/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35399 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content: The Serif is Baskerville. The script face is Lucida Calligraphy, altered a little bit (especially rt and tt).
Mike is right. Lucida is close, but I should have looked closer. Note to self: The first and obvious might not always be the right one.
